50#ifndef AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_H
51#define AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
59typedef struct
60{
61 uint32_t ui32StartAddr; // Starting address of block to invalidate.
62 uint32_t ui32Size; // Size of block to invalidate in bytes.
63} am_hal_cachectrl_range_t;
64
66typedef struct
67{
68 uint8_t ui8MaxOutTransactions; // Maximum Outstanding Transactions on AXI Bus.
69 uint8_t ui8MaxLookAhead; // Maximum Look Ahead.
70 uint8_t ui8MinLookAhead; // Minimum Look Ahead.
71} am_hal_cachectrl_prefetch_t;
72
73//
75//
76typedef enum
77{
80 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_REQ_PREFETCH_CFG = 0,
81 AM_HAL_CACHECTRL_REQ_MAX
82} am_hal_cachectrl_req_e;
83
